name: The Dogs of Chernobyl
description:
TRUE: Hundreds of stray dogs live in the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone, where human access is strictly limited and monitored.

TRUE: Some checkpoint guards have taken to befriending these dogs.

TRUE: Some of the dogs even seem to like it!

UP FOR DEBATE: Whether or not you should venture into lethal levels of radiation to meet more dogs???

possible eye strain warning! it shouldn't be too bad but this is my heads up if you're sensitive to that kind of thing.
